test_cases.name: create_users_models
evaluation_criteria: Generate a Service Model file for the User service, containing the createUser method
Generate a Request Model file for the User request body
Ensure the generated models include id, name, and email properties

test_cases.name: list_users_models
evaluation_criteria: Generate a Service Model file for the User service, containing the getUsers method
Generate a Response Model file for the User response body
Ensure the generated models include id, name, and email properties

test_cases.name: get_users_by_id_models
evaluation_criteria: Generate a Service Model file for the User service, containing the getUserById method
Generate a Response Model file for the User response body
Ensure the generated models include id, name, and email properties

test_cases.name: update_users_models
evaluation_criteria: Generate a Service Model file for the User service, containing the updateUser method
Generate a Request Model file for the User request body
Generate a Response Model file for the User response body. This could be the same as the Request Model file.
Ensure the generated models include id, name, and email properties

test_cases.name: delete_users_models
evaluation_criteria: Generate a Service Model file for the User service, containing the deleteUser method
No other files should be generated

test_cases.name: patch_users_models
evaluation_criteria: Generate a Service Model file for the User service, containing the patchUser method
Generate a Request Model file for the User request body
Generate a Response Model file for the User response body. This could be the same as the Request Model file.
Ensure the generated models include id, name, and email properties

test_cases.name: full_users_api_models
evaluation_criteria: Generate a Service Model file for the User service, containing listUsers, createUser, getUserById, updateUser, patchUser, and deleteUser methods
Generate Request Model files for createUser, updateUser, and patchUser payloads. Some of the files could be the same.
Generate Response Model files for listUsers, getUserById, updateUser, and patchUser operations. Some of the files could be the same.
Ensure models reuse shared User schemas where appropriate and include id, name, email, and age properties
Generate an ErrorResponse model.
